name: express-mustache-jwt-signin-example
description: A set of mustache templates to be used with express-mustache-overlays that provides a Bootstrap and Flexbox theme.

scripts.docker:build: echo 'Docker cannnot copy files from a parent directory so we need to put the current dev version of express-mustache-jwt-signin in this directory and change package.json'; mkdir -p express-mustache-jwt-signin ; rsync --delete --exclude='*.DS_Store' --exclude='example' --exclude='.git' --exclude='node_modules' -aHxv ../ express-mustache-jwt-signin/ ; cat package.json | sed -e 's|file:..|file:express-mustache-jwt-signin|g' > package.json.docker ; docker build . -t thejimmyg/express-mustache-jwt-signin:0.5.0

author: JimmyG
